name: Go Home (Team Godsquid)
description: Go Home is an emotional interactive experience focusing on environmental storytelling through audio and visual prompts. Take the role of an astronaut sent on a mission far out among the stars, finally living his dream, when tragedy strikes in the form of a meteor and sends him spiralling back to Earth. Here he discovers unfathomable isolation as he collects tokens of his life before and remembers the people he left behind to follow his ambition.
